title: Topic 007 Question 036
body: You have 50 Node.js-based projects that you scan by using WhiteSource. Each project includes Package.json, Package-lock.json, and Npm-shrinkwrap.json files.
You need to minimize the number of libraries reports by WhiteSource to only the libraries that you explicitly reference.
options: Configure the File System Agent plug-in.
Add a devDependencies section to Package-lock.json.
